value.stringValue: Incoming High-Value Case for LA Wildfires â€“ Please Prepare for Transfer

assignments.name: Assign_CQC_Values_for_Short_Form
assignments.label: Assign CQC Values for Short Form

choices.name: c_LF_BusinessType_Commercial
choices.choiceText: Commercial Business

choices.name: SF_C_Physical_and_Property
choices.choiceText: Physical and Property (They received both Physical injuries and had property that was damaged)

choices.name: SF_C_Physically
choices.choiceText: Physically Injured (Injuries of smoke/flame/etc. must have occurred inside perimeter of fire.)

choices.name: SF_Fire_Renter
choices.choiceText: Renter (if home)/ Lesee (if a business and not the property owner)

decisions.description: Routes updates to injured party fields based on decisions
decisions.name: Injured_Party_Updates_Routing
decisions.label: Injured Party Updates Routing

decisions.description: DQ based on CQC from short form
decisions.name: Short_Form_CQC_Routing
decisions.label: Short Form CQC Routing

Flow.description: Short form of the questionnaire for LA Wildfires, part of phase 2 of questionnaire flow to revamp and place each core item in separate flows.

dynamicChoiceSets.description: Personal info collection, used for client/party suffix collection
dynamicChoiceSets.name: Personal_Client_Suffix

formulas.description: assign campaign partner based on fire selected
formulas.name: fx_AssignCampaign

formulas.description: creates a name for the damage claim object
formulas.name: fx_Damage_Claim_Name
fx_DQ_Details_CQC
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by})) && (({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> "Eaton (Also known as Altadena)") && ({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> {!SF_Fire_Palisades})), "Don't accept fires in these locations at this time", IF({!QU_SF_Homeowner_Commercial} = "Other", "We only cover Homes and commercial properties currently.", IF({!QU_SF_Physical_Property_damage_check} = "None of the Above", "We only cover physical and emotional damage", IF({!SF_Location_Varification} = "Outside of Zone", "They are currently outside of the affected area borders", "" ))))

formulas.name: fx_DQ_Reason_CQC
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by})) && (({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> "Eaton (Also known as Altadena)") && ({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> {!SF_Fire_Palisades})), "Wrong location", IF({!QU_SF_Homeowner_Commercial} = "Other", "Insufficient coverage", IF({!QU_SF_Physical_Property_damage_check} = "None of the Above", "Insufficient damages", IF({!SF_Location_Varification} = "Outside of Zone", "Wrong location", "" ))))

formulas.description: determine what birthday is filled into the injured party field or not.
formulas.name: fx_InjuredPartyBirthDateField

formulas.description: Formula for conditional visability based on responses.
formulas.name: fx_SF_Fire_CQC

formulas.description: determines if a CQC should be triggered on shortform or not and route agent to a DQ screen.
formulas.name: fx_ShortForm_CQC_Check
formulas.expression: IF( NOT(ISBLANK({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by})) && (({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> "Eaton (Also known as Altadena)") && ({!QU_SF_Fire_affected_by} <> {!SF_Fire_Palisades})), "Fail", IF({!QU_SF_Homeowner_Commercial} = "Other", "Fail", IF({!QU_SF_Physical_Property_damage_check} = "None of the Above", "Fail", IF({!SF_Location_Varification} = "Outside of Zone", "Fail", "Pass" ))))

formulas.description: grabs today date for updating fields
formulas.name: fx_TODAY_Date

Flow.interviewLabel: SRLG | Case Questionnaire | Short Form | LA WildFires {!$Flow.CurrentDateTime}
Flow.label: SRLG | Case Questionnaire | Short Form | LA WildFires

recordCreates.name: Create_Location_for_Damage
recordCreates.label: Create Location for Damage

recordLookups.description: If an agent already filled the information out we don't want them to recreate this.

recordLookups.label: Get ShortForm Location

recordUpdates.label: Update Injured Party Other on Intake

recordUpdates.label: Update Injured Party SELF on Intake

recordUpdates.description: Update all the questionnaire values into the field for questionnaire responses to generate a word doc output
recordUpdates.name: Update_Intake_Questionnaire_Output
recordUpdates.label: Update Intake Questionnaire Output

recordUpdates.description: Updates the party information based on Personal form
recordUpdates.name: Update_PF_Party

recordUpdates.name: Update_SF_Intake
recordUpdates.label: Update SF Intake

fields.name: Note1
fields.fieldText: -- Eaton Fire Questionnaire --

fields.name: Loved_One_Questions
fields.fieldText: Loved One Questions

fields.name: QU_SF_injured_party_date_of_birth
fields.fieldText: What is the injured party's date of birth?

fields.name: QU_SF_Date_Of_Death
fields.fieldText: What is the date of their death (passing)?

fields.name: General_CQC_Verification
fields.fieldText: General CQC Verification

fields.name: QU_SF_Fire_affected_by
fields.fieldText: 1. Which fire were you affected by?

fields.name: QU_SF_Date_of_Birth
fields.fieldText: 2. What is your date of birth?

fields.name: QU_SF_Homeowner_Commercial
fields.fieldText: 3. Are you the homeowner or Commercial Property Owner

fields.name: QU_SF_Physical_Property_damage_check
fields.fieldText: 4. Were you physically injured from the fires or was your property damaged?

fields.name: How_were_you_physically_injured_in_the_fire
fields.fieldText: 5. How were you physically injured in the fire?

fields.name: Damaged_Property_Check_Script
fields.fieldText:
-- You must determine what fire they were apart of before moving forward from the below maps --

https://recovery.lacounty.gov/

fields.name: Address_Verification
fields.fieldText: Address Verification Section

fields.name: SF_Location_Varification
fields.fieldText: AGENT ONLY -- Agent has verified location inside zone

fields.name: SF_Disqualify_Screen
fields.fieldText:
UNFORTUNATELY THEY ARE DQ

Please Read: â€œUnfortunately, we cannot accept your potential case at this time. As such, we are not able to represent you and will not be filing a lawsuit on your behalf. This does not mean you donâ€™t have a case. Please consider contacting another law firm for a second opinion. Thank you for taking the time to speak with us at Saddle Rock Legal Group. Have a great day!â€


**Note to Agent: If the caller asked 'why', itâ€™s okay to simply state that 'Thereâ€™s a current lack of evidence to fit our case criteria.' No further details than that.

screens.description: Used to pull personal info for documents
screens.name: Short_Form_Personal_Info
screens.label: Short Form Personal Info

fields.name: Personal_Info_Intro_Display_Text
fields.fieldText: --- Personal Information Collection for Signing Documents ---

fields.fieldText: Client's First Name (RAQ)

fields.name: Client_Last_Name
fields.fieldText: Client's Last Name (RAQ)

fields.name: Client_Middle_Name
fields.fieldText: Client's Middle Name (RAQ)

fields.name: Client_Suffix
fields.fieldText: Client's Suffix (RAQ)
fields.helpText: Place N/A if there is no Suffix

fields.name: SF_Personal_Script_SSN
fields.fieldText:
-- SSN Script --


"This next request is to help our attorneys start your case. This info is completely confidential, just like our calls. Whatâ€™s your SSN?"

fields.name: Client_Social_Security_Number_SSN
fields.fieldText: Client's Social Security Number (SSN) (RAQ)

fields.name: Injured_Party_Social_Security_Number
fields.fieldText: Injured Party's Social Security Number (SSN) (RAQ)

value.stringValue: What is the best Email to reach you at? (RAQ)

fields.name: QU_Personal_Florida_Resident
fields.fieldText: Are you currently residing in Florida? (RAQ)

fields.name: QU_SF_Number_of_Residents
fields.fieldText: If applicable, how many people resided and/or owned the property?

fields.name: Residents_Script
fields.fieldText:
Please Read: If youâ€™re looking to start a potential case for a loved one, neighbor, or anyone else affected by the fires, we will need to speak directly with the person impacted. If theyâ€™re available, youâ€™re welcome to have them join the call now so we can go over the necessary details together.

If theyâ€™re not available at the moment, you can pass along our contact information so they can reach out to us directly. They can call us at 833-430-8111, and our team will go over a few questions with them. If everything aligns from a preliminary standpoint, we will then send them a retainer agreement for review.

How would you like to proceed?

fields.name: Disqualifying_Header_Display
fields.fieldText: Disqualified

fields.name: Disqualifying_Text_Display
fields.fieldText: Your Intake has been turned down and properly updated.

textTemplates.description: Used as the email template for high Priority Emails
textTemplates.name: High_Priority_Email
textTemplates.text:
Hi Everyone,


We have a high-value case coming your way shortly. Please be ready for a live transfer in the next few minutes.


Client information:

Caller Name: {!Get_Client_Record.Name}

Client Name: {!Get_Client_Record.Name}


CQC Outputs:

-- Coming Soon --
